title: Picks & Bans: SKTelecom T1 mixes things up at MSI

replies.body:
Why do you keep calling faker the greatest player in the world Riot?   Are you feeding faker trolls?  There are already enough people stuck in a time period two years past....Why provoke them?  Faker and SKT didn't even make it to worlds last year because better mid laners and better teams took them out.  Pawn > Faker I think should be pretty obvious and there are other mids better then faker now too.  He sits the bench on his own team with his...legendary champion pool because...What ? Easyhoon plays some champs better then him?   So hes not even the greatest player on his team for certain but hes still the best player in the world for some reason.  Get off it,  doesn't make sense.   If nothing else...realize pawn deserves some recognition for his accomplishments and listing Faker as the TOP mid is a insult to him.   

     Anyone saying things like...."CN better than KR? K."  Don't realize that the top Korean team right now...SKT, couldn't make top three kr last year,  before the best players left Korea for china.   Pawn being sick is the only reason faker might have a chance,  otherwise Pawn owns faker...Not only is he a better mid hes a better leader for his team.  

    Anyways...Noobs I know faker has a cool name that all the kids like to say...faker faker faker.  In all reality faker is not the best anymore and hasn't been for a long time.   Riot trolls are feeding the noob trolls by saying over and over that Faker is THE GREATEST PLAYER IN THE WORLD.  Bah

I completely agree. If anything, Pawn solo killed faker a number of times last year, carried White to victory and carried EDG in many of their games this year too. His assassins such as kass and leblanc are just as good as faker's if not better. However, as it stands, Faker is still easily within top 5 if not top 3 in the mid laner ranking. The only people that I can think of that are arguably better than faker are maybe Pawn, Apdo, Godv (weiless) and Westdoor but at the same time other mid lane stars such as Rookie, Bjerg can easily show up and carry games with the support of their teammates. That said, rly excited to see Faker vs Pawn vs Westdoor vs Bjerg at MSI.

If you forget about the fact that Pawn was with the far superior team in season 4, that he counterpicked Faker in the games he solokilled him, that he isn't as consistent as Faker and never was, that he have had his slumps in which he got carried by a Dandy and Mata in Samung and a Deft (Koro + Clearlove sometimes) in EDG. If we forget that Pawn usually lost vs Easyhoon, that he never was a top 2 korean midlaner eventhough SSW was arguebly the best/2nd best team there, that he have had a slump in China and that he picks off-meta assassins which is the main reason why he have performed better on them, since Faker haven't played an assassin in ages (expect Leblanc and you gotta be bold if you are stating that Pawn is better than Faker on Leblanc).

I don't know. For me, it seems that people love to pick up on these Pawn's solokills but forget that Pawn was in a superior team in season 4 and that he never had the same Impact as Faker in the teams he played with. Sure Pawn is an amazing midlaner and can surely compete with Faker. but stating that he is better than Faker because he solokilled him or because he was in worlds and Faker wasn't isn't too good of an explanation, and would have arguebly been totally different if Faker was the one in Samsung White while Pawn was on SKT.

Aside from that, pros like Dandy and Mata in recent intervies still believe that Faker is the bset. I don't know even know how you can put Weiless and Westdoor ahead of Faker but Apdo has stated himself that he thinks Faker is better than him as a player.

PS. I do believe that Faker is overrated however I also believe that he is still the best midlaner in the world and the weak arguement of ''he was good in s3, pawn solokilled him, faker isn't #1 anylonger'' just doesn't make sense if you look at the big picture and what Faker did for SKT in season 4.

That post, is beautiful.

https://31.media.tumblr.com/80ac19f16cc265a6795ea81ab694c6ec/tumblr_inline_mw6lagi7pQ1rv7u3r.gif
I think at such professional levels, its pretty difficult to rate everyone because everyone has their weaknesses and strengths
People can continue to argue about PawN and Faker  but lets not forget Toyz who also was considered the best mid laner of all time
Pawn is overrated. I watched LGD vs EDG and  LGDGODV was way better than Pawn. I think this year overall China is better than Korea.

I do have to comment on the weirdness of talking about people being stuck in 2 years ago with their Faker hype then bringing up SKT not making it to worlds last hear (multiple times). Is it just me or does that not seem odd that they would focus on that.

Second, Easyhoon is brought into the lineup for strategic diversity. It has been brought up before that Faker optimizes aggressive play styles. Easyhoon has always been known for his defensive play styles, Xerath, Cassio, Azir (to some extent) are champions that he excels at and rightfully so is shown to be better than Faker at (his aggressiveness in the LCK Finals vs GET was stunning but not the norm for him). Both of them will be at MSI (as teams are required to bring only one sub) so SKT will be able to have the diversity of both.

Now, onto the Faker v PawN. It is true that PawN has on multiple occasions killed Faker 1v1 (some of them should be mentioned are after multiple ganks and camping sessions which Faker lived through but that is besides the point). Back in Season 4 PawN's play style was a control mage/passive style. He played Orianna and Morg to much effect to counter Fakers all in play. Its a conflict of strategy.

I do not agree that there is only a single "best" player in the world. There is too much variance in play styles, roles in the team and overall the game is not a single player game. It's a team game, but I will mention that Faker thorough out season 4 had one of the shittiest teams in KR. Bengi played like shit, Piglet was off. PooMandu was garbage. Impact was the only other force on the team and he wasn't a carry top.
How did this one come up before edg?

They already had it written because they already knew that SKT was going to win.
Illuminati confirmed.

To be honest, its likely just a scheduled format. Wild Card > EU > NA > KR > CN > Other Wild Card (TURKEY)
It's like they rigged it so skt won...
Once again, its likely just a timeline that Riot is using to release these articles and nothing sinister (I hope).
Hey guys! Don't worry, there will be an EDG article tomorrow. You're right that we scheduled these once a day, and EDG will be coming up next. Thanks for checking out the series. :)
Thanks Riot SpiNN
where is the article about EDG "tomorrow'??
They seem to come out around the same time. So in about an hour or so.

what does that even mean? First of all GE Tigers vs SKT was not so obvious that they would write one before the matches even started. Second, what kind of scheduled format are you talking about? Taiwan isnt a wildcard it is the LMS. And i dont even understand your ranking either cause its totally false. CN>KR>NA>EU>LMS>Wild Card

WTF are you smoking? Those weren't rankings.

The first part of my comment is meant to be humorous. So please find your sense of humor and come back.

Second, The scheduled format I am talking about is Article Releases in response to @ShadowFiend812. Please stop commenting on things you obviously don't understand/ have comprehension of.

Third, in what world would anyone say that Wild Card, EU, NA are better than Korea or China?

No more crack for Mazacado. Hes had too much.
w/e. You can call me ignorant, troll, or whatever but just know that I regard you the same way. Peace.

I cant comment on the right comment because my computer is glitching and wont let me reply to the latest comment. Calm your tits. 

I read every single word of your comment and once again your idiotic tendency to judge people makes me laugh and disgusted at the same time. Not everyone is on drugs or is trolling. You dont know me i dont know you so keep your judgmental tendencies to yourself.  Stop being ignorant and hypocritical if you are clueless yourself.

once again you try to be sarcastic and funny but you are actually making a fool of yourself. I already exposed the flaws of your comments yet you try to avoid answering by using "sarcasm" cause you know you are wrong lol. What a hypocrite. Try harder.

Oh so this is how it is going to be, you are going to reply to the wrong comment and once again cherry pick your response.

I will admit, I hadn't seen the Turkey Article until you mentioned it. You got me there, but everything else with your original comment was crazy. To think that I would be doing rankings with Wild Card on top. Second, to assume a something ending with "Illuminati confirmed." is anything but a joke, is in itself a joke.

Last, why should I try when you are the troll here? You don't read comments completely, or you don't understand them before you comment. They you fish for a way out or ignore constructive comments.

Please no more troll-o-rino.

your jokes make no sense whatsoever. Maybe its only meant to be funny to you cause nobody is laughing and since you have such a high affinity for drugs I can understand why. 

If you were talking about a scheduled format and LMS>EU>NA>KR>CN>Turkey it still doesn't make any sense since Riot has already wrote an article on Turkey so why would Turkey be last on your "format" list? 

Plz start making some sense then criticize others.
Ok troll. Back to the General Discussion with you!
you're the troll. Troll

Yes, because you know I cherry pick what comments you make that I will reply to ignoring the rest.

I comment on things that I don't understand with the intention that I know it all.

Also, I do like that you go back and edit posts after the fact. It's pretty new in the troll section.

If you couldn't tell all of the above is sarcasm. No copy pasta.
CN better than KR? K.
Yes, it was. So easy to predict, in fact, that SKT won 3-0 without Faker.

For all of the people talking about "who iz da best mid laner" "pawn>faker" or whatever. 
Faker was undeniably the best midlaner if his time, s3. Pawn however always managed to do well against faker, whether he solo killed him on talon or nidalee, but he has also lost to faker, horribly, faker on riven, zed, jayce and leblanc have all seen pawns demise. Faker was dominant in s3, and people overhype him ALL THE TIME because of that, even though he still has flawless professional records on the most champions of any player ever, but besides that, faker still loses, we all know that. Pawn I will say in my opinion is the better LANER, however faker brings his force to the larger team fights around early and consistent dragons or dives. No matter what angle you look at it from, both players are great. Faker may have a better record, but pawn has surely outclassed him in many regards. So for all the people saying pawn leblanc>faker leblanc, just look at the stats.... Really.... And for all the faker fanboys, look up faker vs pawn, the first thing you see is pawn solo killing him. Neither player is better, nor does that even matter... Whoever wins is what matters. Whether it comes to faker xerath vs idk pawn fizz. Pawn will probably get the 1v1 while faker e+w+q the baron for a steal. Both are great. So shut up and watch the MSI and spam reddit about who wins.
Finally someone not retarded. Faker isn't simply over-hyped. He has achievements to back it up. Fckin Faker haters
How do we know whos going to be playing between easyhoon and faker. Do they get to change whenever they feel like? because that seems a bit unfair to other regions without subs.

They only get 1 sub. And they can switch inbetween games. Any team can train with their sub and have diverse strategies. The fact that NA/EU do not allow player swaps is more because they are best of ones, but it's ridiculous that a team in NA/EU have to announce a sub a week in advance.

Faker is hyped but with the good reasons. And can we honestly say we don't like to have a "god" to look up to in the game. I mean as a main support, Madlife will always be the Support God in my eyes and I like that. Just like soccer has like the "Maradonna" and "Messi" (and whatever I don't watch soccer). We should have this iconic figures too, right?

I gotta say, SKT T1 remains my favorite team. Faker is just such a skilled player and manages to entertain with his flashy plays, while Benji continues to be the solid, dependable jungler he's known for. MaRin keeps on rolling with his way of being the anvil to the team's hammer, and Bang and Wolf have dominated bot lane. Really hoping that this roster is what will carry SKT T1 to their second Worlds victory, especially in light of PoohManDu's retirement.
How come there is no video description of EDG??? Are you RIOT just trying to ignore LPL region?? WTF???
The schedule these articles for once a day. Yesterday was MSI power rankings.  People are so impatient.
im not sure why u all mad at each others,  Dade is better than Pawn, even Dade think Faker is better than him, APDO/DOPA also thought Faker was better or rather equal, they win and lose,
Great work
Rito plz i posted this somewhere else but i seriously only need 4 rp to buy a skin for {{champion:201}} i cry {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}  so can u plz send me the 4 rp

My tears have all dried up, kid.. {{champion:17}} Anywho, I've heard that if you submit a ticket to the Riot Gods that they will bless you with the small amount of rp that you need. Also heard you can only receive it once in a certain span of time {{champion:26}}
Hate to tell you this comrade, but Riot doesn't give away RP under any circumstances. They've gotta make money somehow, and that's primarily through RP.
{{champion:119}} {{summoner:2}} {{item:3003}}
People forget last year, its all about three things right now. MSI, Summer Split/Worlds. Can't compare season 4 skills/mechanics with this years competitors tsk tsk
Yall do realize that imp is best player in the world??? {{champion:29}}

I do really want for a western team to win MSI, but i just don't think that the west can beat either EDG or SKT yet. I think that NA/EU will be able to hold up in laning phase for most cases (Bjergson vs Easyhoon/Faker hype), but i fear that no western team can keep up with the crisp rotations and incredible teamfights of SKT/EDG. However, I'm still rooting for ya, TSM/FNC!

Also rooting for the west (specially NA), i actually think FNC has a shot at upsetting EDG. EDG's only weak point it seems atm is their early game - and FNC's playstyle, specially for reignover and huni, usually includes quick early groups. If they play those well, they could potentially snowball beyond EDG"s fighting ability. Not saying they will...but saying they could xd.

while im an NA fan, dont see TSM having much shot vs either team - their biggest strengths are their teamfighting and bgergsen getting solokills. cant see them out teamfighting EDG or bgergsen solokilling pawn. And vs SKT...well TSM basically is STK Lite, So yeah what happens when a slightly weaker version goes up against the real thing?

So yeah, FNC best chance to upset either team cause of their more unique early team oriented style.
Tom, The SKT's Savior

> [{quoted}](name=imFaln,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=92yOjq5E,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-05-05T04:00:12.976+0000)
>
> Tom, The SKT's Savior

Tom is not going to MSI so no need to worry about him. I thought he looked incredible too.
